comment: POTUS signed DEPLOYMENT ORDERS for the nd Airborne Division of the United States Army, instructing them to deploy from Ft. Bragg, NC, to the U.S. southern border at Mexico. They are using force and it is now highly likely that US military force will be used against them if they try those same tactics at the US Border
